summary.para: Stores information about the Shell link state. This structure is used for extra data sections that are tagged with EXP_PROPERTYSTORAGE_SIG.

remarks.para: EXP_PROPERTYSTORAGE is used to store information serialized by the object. It is named with the tag value EXP_PROPERTYSTORAGE_SIG and can be accessed via , including operations for add, remove, and copy. This block can be used to inspect the Shell link state.

summary.para: The size of this structure, in bytes.
Identifies the type of block and is the value EXP_PROPERTYSTORAGE_SIG.
A serialized property store in the format defined by SERIALIZEDPROPSTORAGE.
